sen.j: 九条 道前（くじょう みちさき、延享3年6月13日 (旧暦)（1746年7月30日） - 明和7年6月5日 (旧暦)（1770年6月27日））は江戸時代の公卿。
sen.e: Michisaki KUJO (July 30, 1746 - June 27, 1770) was kugyo (high court noble) in the Edo period.
Michisaki KUJO (July 30, 1746 - June 27, 1770) was a court noble who lived during the Edo period.
sen.cmt: 公卿を Court nobleとし、また 用語統一の「レビュー結果」（2009/7/31）に従い、inの部分を who lived duringに修正致しました。
sen.e: Michisaki KUJO (July 30, 1746 - June 27, 1770) was a court noble who lived during the Edo period.
His father was Naozane KUJO.
His father was Naozane KUJO.
His father was Naozane KUJO.

sen.j: 妻は徳川宗勝の八女・恭姫。
sen.e: His wife was Kyohime, the eighth daughter of Munekatsu TOKUGAWA.
sen.cmt: 「徳川宗勝」の読み方は<http://kotobank.jp/word/%E5%BE%B3%E5%B7%9D%E5%AE%97%E5%8B%9D>を参照。
sen.e: His wife was Kyohime, the eighth daughter of Munekatsu TOKUGAWA.
His wife was Kyohime, the eighth daughter of Munekatsu TOKUGAWA.
Sukeie KUJO was his son.
Sukeie KUJO was his son.
Sukeie KUJO was his son.
His alias was Jokoin (盛光院).
sen.cmt: 盛光院の読み不明が、京都に同じ漢字で「じょうこういん」というお寺がありましたのでこちらを表記しました。
sen.e: His alias was Jokoin (盛光院).
He called himself Jokoin (盛光院).
sen.cmt: 他のファイルに合わせました。

sen.j: 延享3年（1746年）に九条尚実の長男として生まれる。
sen.e: He was born to Naozane KUJO in 1746.
He was born in 1746 as the eldest son of Naozane KUJO.
sen.cmt: 「長男として」が訳漏れでした。
sen.e: He was born in 1746 as the eldest son of Naozane KUJO.

sen.j: 内大臣（1759年 - 1770年）、をつとめた。
sen.e: He served as Naidaijin (Minister of the Center) (1759 - 1770).
He served as Naidaijin (Minister of the Center) (1759 - 1770).
He served as Naidaijin (Minister of the Center) (1759 - 1770).

sen.j: 従一位（1769年（明和6年）1月9日 (旧暦)叙）。
sen.e: He was appointed to Juichii (Junior First Rank) on January 9, 1769 (old calendar).
He rose to the rank of Juichii (Junior First Rank) on February 15, 1769.
sen.cmt: 位が上がったため rose to に変え、日付を新暦に修正致しました。
sen.e: He rose to the rank of Juichii (Junior First Rank) on February 15, 1769.
He died in 1770.
He died in 1770.
He died in 1770.
